--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestration​
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_log_csv_dedicated
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO dbo.log_csv_dedicated
(Correlationid 1, Operationname 2, Status 3, Eventcategory 4, Level 5, Time 6, Subscription 7, Eventinitiatedby 8, Resourcetype 9, Resourcegroup 10, Resource 11)
FROM 'https://dp203storageaccount2024.dfs.core.windows.net/csv/Log.csv'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,FIRSTROW = 2
	,ERRORFILE = 'https://dp203storageaccount2024.dfs.core.windows.net//csv/'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.log_csv_dedicated
GO

CREATE  TABLE log_csv_dedicated(
    [Correlationid] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[Operationname] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[Status] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Eventcategory] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Level] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Time] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Subscription] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[Eventinitiatedby] [varchar](1000) NULL,
	[Resourcetype] [varchar](1000) NULL,
	[Resourcegroup] [varchar](1000) NULL,
    [Resource] [varchar](2000) NULL

)

COPY INTO log_csv_dedicated FROM 'https://dp203storageaccount2024.blob.core.windows.net/csv/Log.csv'
WITH(
    FILE_TYPE='CSV',
    CREDENTIAL=(IDENTITY='Storage Account Key'
    , SECRET='JIF6BIFPxAKsvXTNn4MB5doae0CHH8yBGecOr97UzK1nOMd3V0TkD/SuDuZ/EQEc/PU9nWzi6SPP+AStW3sWVw=='),
    FIRSTROW=2
)

SELECT * from log_csv_dedicated

CREATE  TABLE log_parquet_dedicated(
    [Correlationid] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[Operationname] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[Status] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Eventcategory] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Level] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Time] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Subscription] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[Eventinitiatedby] [varchar](1000) NULL,
	[Resourcetype] [varchar](1000) NULL,
	[Resourcegroup] [varchar](1000) NULL,
    [Resource] [varchar](2000) NULL

)
;
COPY INTO log_parquet_dedicated FROM 'https://dp203storageaccount2024.blob.core.windows.net/parquet/log.parquet'
WITH
(
    FILE_TYPE='Parquet',
    CREDENTIAL=(
        IDENTITY='Storage account key',
        SECRET ='JIF6BIFPxAKsvXTNn4MB5doae0CHH8yBGecOr97UzK1nOMd3V0TkD/SuDuZ/EQEc/PU9nWzi6SPP+AStW3sWVw=='

    )
)

select * from log_parquet_dedicated

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL logfile_credential
WITH IDENTITY='dp203storageaccount2024',
     SECRET ='JIF6BIFPxAKsvXTNn4MB5doae0CHH8yBGecOr97UzK1nOMd3V0TkD/SuDuZ/EQEc/PU9nWzi6SPP+AStW3sWVw=='

DROP EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT csv_externaltable_format;
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT csv_externaltable_format
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE= DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS(
        FIRST_ROW=2,
        FIELD_TERMINATOR=','
    )
)

DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE logfile_externaltable;
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE logfile_externaltable
WITH(
    LOCATION ='abfss://csv@dp203storageaccount2024.dfs.core.windows.net',
    CREDENTIAL=logfile_credential,
    TYPE=HADOOP
)

DROP EXTERNAL TABLE logdata_externaltable_csv;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE logdata_externaltable_csv
(
    [Correlationid] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[Operationname] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[Status] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Eventcategory] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Level] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Time] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Subscription] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[Eventinitiatedby] [varchar](1000) NULL,
	[Resourcetype] [varchar](1000) NULL,
	[Resourcegroup] [varchar](1000) NULL,
    [Resource] [varchar](2000) NULL

)
WITH(
    LOCATION='/Log.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE=logfile_externaltable,
    FILE_FORMAT=csv_externaltable_format
)

select * from logdata_externaltable_csv

--CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION by PASSWORD ='Welcome@123';
--DROP EXTERNAL TABLE log_parquet
--DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE parquetfile;
--drop DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL SasToken;
--DROP EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT  Parquetfileformat


CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL SasToken
WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
    SECRET ='sv=2022-11-02&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupyx&se=2024-01-27T15:04:04Z&st=2024-01-27T07:04:04Z&spr=https&sig=K9fYV9Smd40bWHOHN0qt4Zkk6JQsNV8ZGG2RUg4aAho%3D'
;
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE parquetfile
WITH(
    LOCATION ='https://dp203storageaccount2024.blob.core.windows.net/parquet',
    CREDENTIAL =SasToken
)
;
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT Parquetfileformat
WITH(
    FORMAT_TYPE=PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION ='org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.GzipCodec'
)
;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE log_parquet(
    [Correlationid] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[Operationname] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[Status] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Eventcategory] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Level] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Time] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Subscription] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[Eventinitiatedby] [varchar](1000) NULL,
	[Resourcetype] [varchar](1000) NULL,
	[Resourcegroup] [varchar](1000) NULL,
    [Resource] [varchar](2000) NULL

)
WITH(
    LOCATION ='/log.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE=parquetfile,
    FILE_FORMAT =Parquetfileformat
);

SELECT * FROM log_parquet

select * FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://dp203storageaccount2024.blob.core.windows.net/parquet/*.parquet',
    FORMAT = 'parquet'
) as [data1]

drop table log_polybase_parquet;

create table log_polybase_parquet
with(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN
)
AS
select * from logdata_externaltable_csv

select * from log_polybase_parquet



DELETE from log_polybase_parquet

--CREATE DATABASE aasdev;

CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD ='Welcome@123';

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL SasToken
with IDENTITY ='SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
     SECRET ='sv=2022-11-02&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupyx&se=2024-01-27T15:04:04Z&st=2024-01-27T07:04:04Z&spr=https&sig=K9fYV9Smd40bWHOHN0qt4Zkk6JQsNV8ZGG2RUg4aAho%3D'
;
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE multipleparquet
WITH(
    LOCATION ='https://dp203storageaccount2024.blob.core.windows.net/parquet',
    CREDENTIAL=SasToken
);

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT parquetfileformat
with(
    FORMAT_TYPE =PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION ='org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.GzipCodec'

);

create EXTERNAL TABLE log_data_parquet(
    [Correlationid] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[Operationname] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[Status] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Eventcategory] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Level] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Time] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Subscription] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[Eventinitiatedby] [varchar](1000) NULL,
	[Resourcetype] [varchar](1000) NULL,
	[Resourcegroup] [varchar](1000) NULL,
    [Resource] [varchar](2000) NULL
)
WITH(
    LOCATION ='/',
    DATA_SOURCE =multipleparquet,
    FILE_FORMAT =parquetfileformat
);


SELECT * FROM log_data_parquet

create DATABASE aaasdev

create MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION by PASSWORD ='#NeedT0Upgrage'

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL SasToken
WITH IDENTITY ='SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
     SECRET ='sv=2022-11-02&ss=b&srt=sco&sp=rwdlyx&se=2024-01-27T13:20:40Z&st=2024-01-27T05:20:40Z&spr=https&sig=Qv1JCXKNQn0J6nifo0xb9z9vEPCJ6Zs9%2BvGvN0Sca74%3D'

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE LOG_FILE
WITH (
    LOCATION ='https://dp203storageaccount2024.blob.core.windows.net/csv',
    CREDENTIAL =SasToken
)

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT fileformat2
with(
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (
        FIRST_ROW =2,
        FIELD_TERMINATOR =','
    )
)

drop EXTERNAL TABLE logdata
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE logdata
(
    [Correlation id] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[Operation name] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[Status] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Event category] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Level] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Time] [datetime] NULL,
	[Subscription] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[Event initiated by] [varchar](1000) NULL,
	[Resource type] [varchar](1000) NULL,
	[Resource group] [varchar](1000) NULL,
    [Resource] [varchar](2000) NULL

)
WITH(
    LOCATION ='/Log.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE =LOG_FILE,
    FILE_FORMAT =fileformat2
)

select * from logdata

create database aaastest


create MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION by PASSWORD ='Welcome@123'


CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL SasToken2
WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
     SECRET ='sv=2022-11-02&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupyx&se=2024-01-27T14:15:20Z&st=2024-01-27T06:15:20Z&spr=https&sig=F9Uzy2LK2HDwVSSQVE1%2FczEsfxOeKwG9Bu85KHcsax0%3D'
;
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE LOGDATA_PARQUET
WITH (
    LOCATION ='https://dp203storageaccount2024.blob.core.windows.net/parquet',
    CREDENTIAL=SasToken2
);


CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT logdata_parquet
with(
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.GzipCodec'
    );

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE logdata_parquet
(
    [Correlationid] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[Operationname] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[Status] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Eventcategory] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Level] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Time] [varchar](500) NULL,
	[Subscription] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[Event initiated by] [varchar](1000) NULL,
	[Resource type] [varchar](1000) NULL,
	[Resource group] [varchar](1000) NULL,
    [Resource] [varchar](2000) NULL

)
WITH(
    LOCATION ='/log.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE =LOGDATA_PARQUET,
    FILE_FORMAT=logdata_parquet
)
;
select * from logdata_parquet
